comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_7_1) AppleWebKit/534.48.3 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/5.1 Safari/534.48.3

Steps to reproduce:

Switched graphics cards from integrated to discrete ATI using gfxCardStatus 2.1 on Mac Lion running on 2011 Macbook Pro 15".


Actual results:

Scrolling is noticeably choppy on the discrete card. It remains choppy when switching back to integrated. This is solved by a restart of Firefox.


Expected results:

Scrolling remains the same.
